title: Basics of CSS
info: CSS can be used to more efficiently design multiple web pages at the same time. CSS stands for Cascading Style Sheets. With CSS, you can code the way multiple web pages look (layout, design, format, and more) at the same time.

By using CSS, you can control a number of design features on your web page. For example, you can code for color, text size, font, the position of elements, the space between elements, how web pages display on different screen sizes and devices, and a whole lot more.
